mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_SYS_LOG_PARAM syslogparam where syslogparam.ID = #{id}
SELECT * FROM TB_SYS_LOG_PARAM syslogparam where syslogparam.url = #{reqUrl} and syslogparam.SOURCE=#{source}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_SYS_LOG_PARAM syslogparam SET syslogparam.SOURCE = #{source:NUMERIC}, syslogparam.MENUNAME = #{menuName:VARCHAR}, syslogparam.OPERNAME = #{operName:VARCHAR}, syslogparam.UPDATETIME = sysdate, syslogparam.URL = #{url:VARCHAR} WHERE syslogparam.ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_SYS_LOG_PARAM syslogparam WHERE syslogparam.ID=#{id}

DELETE FROM TB_SYS_LOG_PARAM WHERE ID in
#{ids}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM TB_SYS_LOG_PARAM syslogparam WHERE 1=1
and ( syslogparam.ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or syslogparam.SOURCE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or syslogparam.MENUNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or syslogparam.OPERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or syslogparam.CREATETIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or syslogparam.UPDATETIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or syslogparam.CREATOR LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or syslogparam.URL LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') )
